entries.title: Musk cheerleaders and conservative influencers criticize journalist suspensions from Twitter
entries.description: Some of Elon Musk’s biggest boosters, alongside some conservative influencers, are condemning Twitter’s decision to suspend several high-profile journalists.

entries.title: Musk's suspension of journalists could embolden authoritarians, free speech experts warn
entries.description: Humanitarian watchdogs said despots and authoritarian regimes may see Elon Musk's actions as an invitation for manipulation.

entries.title: Democratic senator questions Twitter's handling of child safety under Elon Musk
entries.description: Senate Judiciary Committee Chair Dick Durbin sent a letter to Elon Musk on Friday expressing concern that Twitter’s approach to child safety had “rapidly deteriorated” since Musk bought the social media site in October.

entries.title: Twitter suspends journalists who have been covering Elon Musk and the company
entries.description: Twitter on Thursday evening suddenly suspended several high-profile journalists who cover the platform and Elon Musk, one of the richest people in the world,

entries.title: GOP lawmakers want answers from Uber about drivers allegedly transporting drugs
